name: CSS-Base
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for base. Universal reset: margin 0, padding 0, box-sizing border-box. Body: background #000, width 100vw, height 100vh, overflow hidden, font-family Roboto sans-serif, color white. Canvas fire-canvas: position fixed, top 0, left 0, width 100%, height 100vh, z-index 1, filter drop-shadow(0 0 20px rgba(255,100,0,0.5)).

name: CSS-Controls
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for controls panel. #controls: position fixed, bottom 20px, right 20px, background rgba(10,10,10,0.85), backdrop-filter blur(10px), padding 25px, border-radius 12px, border 1px solid rgba(255,100,0,0.3), z-index 10, width 320px, box-shadow 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.5). h2: font-family Orbitron sans-serif, color #ff6600, font-size 20px, margin-bottom 20px, text-shadow 0 0 10px rgba(255,100,0,0.5). Label: display flex, justify-content space-between, align-items center, margin 12px 0, font-size 13px, color rgba(255,255,255,0.9). Span for value display: color #ffaa00, font-weight bold, min-width 40px, text-align right.

name: CSS-Sliders
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for sliders and buttons. Input type range: width 100%, margin 8px 0, height 6px, border-radius 3px, background linear-gradient(90deg,#ff0000,#ff6600,#ffaa00), outline none, -webkit-appearance none. Range thumb webkit: width 18px, height 18px, border-radius 50%, background #ffaa00, cursor pointer, box-shadow 0 0 15px rgba(255,170,0,0.7), transition transform 0.2s. Range thumb hover: transform scale(1.2), box-shadow 0 0 25px rgba(255,170,0,1). Buttons: background linear-gradient(135deg,#ff6600,#ff3300), border none, color white, padding 12px 16px, border-radius 8px, cursor pointer, margin 6px 3px, font-size 12px, font-weight bold, transition all 0.3s, box-shadow 0 4px 15px rgba(255,100,0,0.3). Button hover: transform translateY(-2px), box-shadow 0 6px 25px rgba(255,100,0,0.6).

name: CSS-Gauges
prompt: Generate ONLY CSS code for gauges and counters. #temp-gauge: position fixed, top 20px, left 20px, width 50px, height 350px, background linear-gradient(to top,#ff0000 0%,#ff6600 25%,#ffaa00 50%,#ffff00 75%,#ffffff 100%), border 3px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.8), border-radius 25px, z-index 10, box-shadow 0 0 30px rgba(255,100,0,0.6), filter drop-shadow(0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)). #fps, #particle-count: position fixed, top 20px, background rgba(0,0,0,0.8), color #ffaa00, padding 10px 20px, border-radius 8px, font-size 14px, font-family Roboto Mono monospace, z-index 10, border 1px solid rgba(255,170,0,0.3). #fps: right 20px. #particle-count: right 20px, top 60px.
